title: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai.
title_en: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
title_jp: あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。
synopsis: After a tragic accident during their childhood, Jinta and his group of friends split apart and live separate lives. Now in high school, the group is drawn together once more by an unknown force.
